text: Fourteen Hours is a 1951 American crime drama movie directed by Henry Hathaway and based on the 1949 short story The Man on the Ledge by Joel Sayre. It stars Paul Douglas, Richard Basehart, Barbara Bel Geddes, Debra Paget, Agnes Moorehead, Jeffrey Hunter, Grace Kelly and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1952. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Henry Hathaway
title: Fourteen Hours
